column4: Anybody know how I can easily(ish) set up ipv6 tunneling from behind my router? :-P
I never used Debian-style stuff until Ubuntu-- I originally had been kinda repulsed just based on the fact that Debian itself seemed to only come in so many CDs..

debian is meant to be installed via the net and a small boot image ... normal debian install for me took between 50 and 130MB of download for the boot image, depending on which one i wanted, the rest was automically downloaded on the fly during install
